zh-cn: 伊拉克和沙姆伊斯兰国
伊拉克和黎凡特伊斯兰国
en: Islamic State of Iraq and al-Sham
Islamic State of Iraq and the Levant

description.zh-cn: 一个活跃在伊拉克和叙利亚的萨拉菲圣战主义组织以及未被世界广泛认可的政治实体，奉行极端保守的伊斯兰原教旨主义瓦哈比派，属逊尼宗的一脉。其前身为1999年成立的“统一圣战组织”，在2014年宣布建立“哈里发国”，并在叙利亚内战和伊拉克内战中迅速扩张。2019年3月，其最后的据点被攻克，但其残余势力仍在全球多地活动。
description.en: An active Salafi jihadist organization and widely unrecognized political entity in Iraq and Syria, adhering to an extremely conservative Wahhabi school of Islamic fundamentalism, a branch of Sunni Islam. Its predecessor, 'Jama'at al-Tawhid wal-Jihad', was founded in 1999. It declared the establishment of a 'Caliphate' in 2014 and expanded rapidly during the Syrian and Iraqi Civil Wars. In March 2019, its last stronghold was captured, but its remnants continue to operate in various parts of the world.

description.zh-cn: “统一圣战组织”的创始人及首任领导人，该组织是“伊斯兰国”的前身。
description.en: Founder and first leader of 'Jama'at al-Tawhid wal-Jihad', the predecessor organization to the Islamic State.

description.zh-cn: 北美洲的国家，在反恐战争中对伊斯兰国及其前身组织领导人发动了多次军事打击。
description.en: A country in North America that has launched multiple military strikes against the Islamic State and its predecessor organization's leaders in the War on Terror.

description.zh-cn: 一个国际伊斯兰恐怖主义组织。伊斯兰国的前身曾是其在伊拉克的分支，后因其过于极端残忍而在2014年与其断绝关系。
description.en: An international Islamic terrorist organization. The predecessor of the Islamic State was its branch in Iraq, but Al-Qaeda severed ties with it in 2014 due to its extreme brutality.

description.zh-cn: 基地组织的首领。伊斯兰国的前身“统一圣战组织”曾于2004年向其宣誓效忠。
description.en: Leader of Al-Qaeda. The Islamic State's predecessor, 'Jama'at al-Tawhid wal-Jihad', pledged allegiance to him in 2004.

zh-cn: 阿布·阿卜杜拉·拉希德·巴格达迪

description.zh-cn: “伊拉克伊斯兰国”的首任挂名埃米尔，于2010年被美国和伊拉克联军击毙。
description.en: The first nominal Emir of the 'Islamic State of Iraq', killed in 2010 by a joint US-Iraqi force.

description.zh-cn: 埃及人，在扎卡维死后继任为伊拉克基地组织领导人，后成为伊拉克伊斯兰国的实际掌权者。于2010年被美国和伊拉克联军击毙。
description.en: An Egyptian who succeeded al-Zarqawi as the leader of al-Qaeda in Iraq and later became the de facto leader of the Islamic State of Iraq. He was killed in 2010 by a joint US-Iraqi force.

description.zh-cn: 西亚国家，伊斯兰国活动的核心区域之一，其政府军与伊斯兰国长期交战。
description.en: A country in Western Asia, one of the core areas of Islamic State activity. Its government forces have been in long-term conflict with IS.

description.zh-cn: 伊斯兰国的领导人，于2014年自封为哈里发。2019年10月在美军的突袭行动中丧生。
description.en: Leader of the Islamic State who self-proclaimed as Caliph in 2014. He was killed in a US raid in October 2019.

description.zh-cn: 一个在叙利亚活动的激进组织，最初由“伊拉克伊斯兰国”于2011年组建，后因不同意合并入“伊拉克和沙姆伊斯兰国”而与其决裂。
description.en: A radical group operating in Syria, initially formed by the 'Islamic State of Iraq' in 2011. It later broke away after disagreeing with the merger into the 'Islamic State of Iraq and al-Sham'.

description.zh-cn: 2003年由美国及其盟友发动的对伊拉克的军事行动。伊斯兰国领导人声称这场战争是他们发起圣战的原因。
description.en: A military campaign against Iraq launched by the United States and its allies in 2003. Islamic State leaders claimed this war was the reason for their launching of a jihad.

description.zh-cn: 美国第43任总统，于2003年发动伊拉克战争。
description.en: The 43rd President of the United States, who launched the Iraq War in 2003.

description.zh-cn: 阿拉伯半岛的国家。被指对伊斯兰国提供了支持和资助，但其政府也是伊斯兰国的公开反对者。
description.en: A country on the Arabian Peninsula. It has been accused of providing support and funding to the Islamic State, although its government is also an official opponent of IS.

description.zh-cn: 位于波斯湾的酋长国。被指对伊斯兰国提供了支持和资助。
description.en: An emirate in the Persian Gulf. It has been accused of providing support and funding to the Islamic State.

description.zh-cn: 在叙利亚内战中由库尔德人、阿拉伯人及其他族群组成的反政府武装联盟，受美国支持。2019年3月攻占了伊斯兰国在叙利亚的最后据点。
description.en: An anti-government armed alliance in the Syrian Civil War, composed of Kurds, Arabs, and other ethnic groups, supported by the United States. In March 2019, it captured the last stronghold of the Islamic State in Syria.

description.zh-cn: 叙利亚村庄，伊斯兰国在叙利亚的最后一个据点，于2019年3月23日被叙利亚民主力量攻克。
description.en: A Syrian village that was the last stronghold of the Islamic State in Syria, captured by the Syrian Democratic Forces on March 23, 2019.

description.zh-cn: 2019年4月21日在斯里兰卡发生的一系列恐怖袭击事件，伊斯兰国宣称对此负责。
description.en: A series of terrorist attacks that occurred in Sri Lanka on April 21, 2019, for which the Islamic State claimed responsibility.

description.zh-cn: 2019年10月27日美军在叙利亚伊德利卜地区发起的一次突袭行动，导致伊斯兰国领导人巴格达迪丧生。
description.en: A raid launched by US forces in Syria's Idlib region on October 27, 2019, which resulted in the death of Islamic State leader Abu Bakr al-Baghdadi.

description.zh-cn: 美国第45任总统，于2019年10月27日宣布伊斯兰国领导人巴格达迪在美军突袭中丧生。
description.en: The 45th President of the United States, who announced on October 27, 2019, that Islamic State leader Abu Bakr al-Baghdadi had been killed in a US raid.

nodes.id: 阿布·易卜拉欣·哈希米·库拉希

zh-cn: 阿布·易卜拉欣·哈希米·库拉希

description.zh-cn: 伊斯兰国第二任哈里发，在美军的突袭行动中引爆炸弹自尽。
description.en: The second Caliph of the Islamic State, who killed himself by detonating a bomb during a US raid.

description.zh-cn: 在尼日利亚活动的恐怖组织，于2015年3月宣誓效忠伊斯兰国。
description.en: A terrorist organization active in Nigeria, which pledged allegiance to the Islamic State in March 2015.

description.zh-cn: 阿富汗的伊斯兰原教旨主义运动组织。与伊斯兰国存在敌对关系，并发生过武装冲突。
description.en: An Islamic fundamentalist movement in Afghanistan. It has a hostile relationship with the Islamic State and has engaged in armed conflicts with it.

description.zh-cn: 塔利班的创始人和前精神领袖，曾被伊斯兰国领导人巴格达迪称为“傻瓜和无知的军阀”。
description.en: The founder and former spiritual leader of the Taliban, who was called a 'fool and an ignorant warlord' by Islamic State leader Baghdadi.

description.zh-cn: 横跨欧亚两洲的国家。有报道指其曾与伊斯兰国进行石油交易，但其政府也是伊斯兰国的公开反对者和打击力量之一。
description.en: A transcontinental country in Eurasia. It has been reported to have engaged in oil trade with the Islamic State, but its government is also an official opponent and one of the forces combating IS.

description.zh-cn: 横跨欧亚大陆的国家。在叙利亚内战中对伊斯兰国进行了大量空袭，是其主要反对者之一。
description.en: A transcontinental country in Eurasia. It has conducted extensive airstrikes against the Islamic State in the Syrian Civil War and is one of its main opponents.

nodes.id: 阿布·穆斯利姆·图尔克马尼

zh-cn: 阿布·穆斯利姆·图尔克马尼

description.zh-cn: 伊斯兰国在伊拉克占领区的军事指挥官，曾是伊拉克军方情报部门中校。2014年11月在美国的空袭中丧生。
description.en: The military commander of the Islamic State in occupied Iraq, formerly a lieutenant colonel in Iraqi military intelligence. He was killed in a US airstrike in November 2014.

description.zh-cn: 一个全部由女性组成的库尔德民兵组织，在叙利亚与伊斯兰国作战。
description.en: An all-female Kurdish militia organization that fights against the Islamic State in Syria.

description.zh-cn: 阿布·穆萨布·扎卡维于1999年建立了“统一圣战组织”，该组织是伊斯兰国的前身。
description.en: Abu Musab al-Zarqawi founded 'Jama'at al-Tawhid wal-Jihad' in 1999, the predecessor organization to the Islamic State.

description.zh-cn: 阿布·穆萨布·扎卡维在2006年6月7日遭美军空袭炸死。
description.en: Abu Musab al-Zarqawi was killed in a US airstrike on June 7, 2006.

description.zh-cn: 伊斯兰国的前身“统一圣战组织”于2004年10月宣布效忠基地组织，成为其伊拉克分支。2014年2月，基地组织宣布与其断绝所有联系。
description.en: The Islamic State's predecessor, 'Jama'at al-Tawhid wal-Jihad', pledged allegiance to Al-Qaeda in October 2004, becoming its Iraqi branch. In February 2014, Al-Qaeda announced it was severing all ties with the group.

description.zh-cn: 2004年10月，伊斯兰国前身“统一圣战组织”的领导人扎卡维宣布效忠奥萨马·本·拉登。
description.en: In October 2004, Zarqawi, the leader of the Islamic State's predecessor 'Jama'at al-Tawhid wal-Jihad', pledged allegiance to Osama bin Laden.

description.zh-cn: 2014年2月，基地组织因认为伊斯兰国过于极端、残忍，宣布与其切断所有联系，并谴责其恶行。
description.en: In February 2014, Al-Qaeda severed all ties with the Islamic State, deeming it too extreme and brutal, and condemned its actions.

description.zh-cn: 2010年4月18日，阿布·奥马尔·巴格达迪被美国和伊拉克联军击毙。
description.en: On April 18, 2010, Abu Abdullah al-Rashid al-Baghdadi was killed by joint US and Iraqi forces.

description.zh-cn: 2010年4月18日，阿布·奥马尔·巴格达迪被美国和伊拉克联军击毙。
description.en: On April 18, 2010, Abu Abdullah al-Rashid al-Baghdadi was killed by joint US and Iraqi forces.

description.zh-cn: 2010年4月18日，阿布·艾尤卜·穆哈吉尔被美国和伊拉克联军击毙。
description.en: On April 18, 2010, Abu Ayyub al-Masri was killed by joint US and Iraqi forces.

description.zh-cn: 2010年4月18日，阿布·艾尤卜·穆哈吉尔被美国和伊拉克联军击毙。
description.en: On April 18, 2010, Abu Ayyub al-Masri was killed by joint US and Iraqi forces.

description.zh-cn: 2011年，当时还隶属于盖达组织的“伊拉克伊斯兰国”武装分子进入叙利亚，组建了“努斯拉阵线”。
description.en: In 2011, militants from the 'Islamic State of Iraq', then affiliated with Al-Qaeda, entered Syria and formed the 'Al-Nusra Front'.

description.zh-cn: 2013年4月，巴格达迪单方面宣布合并“伊拉克伊斯兰国”和“努斯拉阵线”，但遭到努斯拉阵线成员反对，两者最终决裂。
description.en: In April 2013, Baghdadi unilaterally announced the merger of the 'Islamic State of Iraq' and the 'Al-Nusra Front', but members of the Nusra Front opposed it, leading to a final split.

description.zh-cn: 伊斯兰国的领导人声称，2003年发动的伊拉克战争是他们发起对美国圣战的原因。
description.en: Leaders of the Islamic State claimed that the 2003 Iraq War was the reason for them to launch a jihad against the United States.

description.zh-cn: 时任美国总统小布什于2003年发动了伊拉克战争。
description.en: Then-U.S. President George W. Bush launched the Iraq War in 2003.

description.zh-cn: 沙特阿拉伯等海湾逊尼派国家被指对伊斯兰国提供了或明或暗的支持和资助，以对抗什叶派国家。
description.en: Gulf Sunni states like Saudi Arabia have been accused of providing overt or covert support and funding to the Islamic State to counter Shia nations.

description.zh-cn: 卡达等海湾逊尼派国家被指对伊斯兰国提供了或明或暗的支持和资助，以对抗什叶派国家。
description.en: Gulf Sunni states like Qatar have been accused of providing overt or covert support and funding to the Islamic State to counter Shia nations.

description.zh-cn: 2019年3月23日，叙利亚民主力量攻克了伊斯兰国在叙利亚的最后据点巴古斯村，终结了其有形领土的统治。
description.en: On March 23, 2019, the Syrian Democratic Forces captured the village of Baghuz, the last stronghold of the Islamic State in Syria, ending its territorial rule.

description.zh-cn: 叙利亚民主力量是受美国支持的叙利亚反政府武装势力。
description.en: The Syrian Democratic Forces are a US-backed Syrian opposition armed force.

description.zh-cn: 伊斯兰国于2019年4月23日宣称对斯里兰卡发生的连环爆炸案负责。
description.en: The Islamic State claimed responsibility on April 23, 2019, for the series of bombings in Sri Lanka.

description.zh-cn: 在巴里沙突袭行动中，伊斯兰国领导人阿布·贝克尔·巴格达迪丧生。
description.en: In the Barisha raid, Islamic State leader Abu Bakr al-Baghdadi was killed.

description.zh-cn: 巴里沙突袭是美军于叙利亚伊德利卜地区发起的一次军事行动。
description.en: The Barisha raid was a military operation launched by US forces in Syria's Idlib region.

description.zh-cn: 时任美国总统唐纳德·川普宣布了巴里沙突袭行动的结果。
description.en: Then-U.S. President Donald Trump announced the results of the Barisha raid.

relationships.target: 阿布·易卜拉欣·哈希米·库拉希

description.zh-cn: 伊斯兰国第二任哈里发阿布·易卜拉欣·哈希米·库拉希在美军发起的突袭行动中自杀身亡。
description.en: The second Caliph of the Islamic State, Abu Ibrahim al-Hashimi al-Qurashi, killed himself during a raid launched by US forces.

description.zh-cn: 2015年3月7日，尼日利亚恐怖组织博科圣地宣布效忠伊斯兰国。
description.en: On March 7, 2015, the Nigerian terrorist organization Boko Haram pledged allegiance to the Islamic State.

description.zh-cn: 伊斯兰国与塔利班相互敌视，巴格达迪曾辱骂塔利班领袖，塔利班则发布教令宣布伊斯兰国为非法组织，双方在阿富汗发生过武装冲突。
description.en: The Islamic State and the Taliban are hostile to each other. Baghdadi insulted the Taliban leader, and the Taliban issued a fatwa declaring the Islamic State an illegal organization. The two sides have engaged in armed conflict in Afghanistan.

description.zh-cn: 2015年1月，巴格达迪称塔利班领袖穆罕默德·奥马尔是“傻瓜和无知的军阀”。
description.en: In January 2015, Baghdadi called Taliban leader Mohammed Omar 'a fool and an ignorant warlord'.

description.zh-cn: 自2015年起，俄军针对伊斯兰国的石油设施及运输能力进行了大量空袭，导致其石油收入大减。
description.en: Since 2015, the Russian military has conducted extensive airstrikes against the Islamic State's oil facilities and transport capabilities, leading to a significant reduction in its oil revenue.

relationships.target: 阿布·穆斯利姆·图尔克马尼

description.zh-cn: 2014年11月，美国对伊拉克的一次空袭打死了伊斯兰国组织的3名头目，其中包括二号人物阿布·穆斯利姆·图尔克马尼。
description.en: In November 2014, a US airstrike in Iraq killed three leaders of the Islamic State, including the second-in-command, Abu Muslim al-Turkmani.

description.zh-cn: 伊斯兰国将美国视为主要敌人，并因伊拉克战争而对其发起圣战。美国则领导多国联盟对伊斯兰国进行军事打击。
description.en: The Islamic State considers the United States a primary enemy and launched a jihad against it due to the Iraq War. The U.S. leads a multinational coalition conducting military strikes against the Islamic State.

description.zh-cn: 妇女保护部队是一个全女性的库尔德民兵组织，在叙利亚与伊斯兰国作战。
description.en: The Women's Protection Units (YPJ) is an all-female Kurdish militia that fights against the Islamic State in Syria.
